text: 11.37 1 Kin 21.13, 2 Kin 1.8, 2 Sto 24.21, Apo 7.58, 14.19 Ogɨnap kab sɨlok paklel kumɨlak, ogɨnap kɨli so dɨl tɨbɨlɨkel dayday lak. Ogɨnap kɨli baynat dɨl, pɨsnep puŋɨl lel kumɨlak. Ogɨnap kɨli mɨŋel awl ñɨl gɨ tɨmel gel gel koslam mɨdɨl, yɨmgeptek chag sipsip chag meme wak ak dɨl, chech tek yɨmɨl gɨ ajelɨgɨpal.
